articles.author: Maayan Lubell
articles.title: South African variant can 'break through' Pfizer vaccine, Israeli study says - Reuters
articles.description: The coronavirus variant discovered in South Africa can "break through" Pfizer/BioNTech's COVID-19 vaccine to some extent, a real-world data study in Israel found, though its prevalence in the country is low and the research has not been peer reviewed.
articles.content:
By Maayan Lubell
JERUSALEM (Reuters) - The coronavirus variant discovered in South Africa can break through Pfizer/BioNTechs COVID-19 vaccine to some extent, a real-world data study in Israel found,… [+3199 chars]

articles.title: New cases of UK, South Africa COVID-19 variants mostly local - Rappler
articles.description: Of the 192 new cases of the South African variant, 143 are local cases. Of the 170 new cases of UK variant, 119 are local.
articles.content: There were 19 new cases of the P3 variant, or the variant first found in the Philippines. Of the 19, there were 10 local cases, 2 ROFs, and 7 still being verified. "All have recovered," said the DOH,… [+28 chars]
